# accessibilityIndex()

**Instance Method**

Returns the index for the row.

## Declaration

```swift
func accessibilityIndex() -> Int
```

## Return Value

The index for the row.

## Discussion

This method is the getter for the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSAccessibilityProtocol] protocol’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSAccessibility-c.protocol/accessibilityIndex] property.

## Supporting Accessibility

- **accessibilityDisclosureLevel()**: Returns the indention level for the row.
